subtitle.subtitle: Only about 15 minutes to San Francisco.
Thanks to that little black market baby. [laughing]
I still can't believe we found a collector
willing to pay that much for a stinkin' ape.
Come on, Wheeler, we might have bagged the last wild ape on Earth!
Hey! How the heck did he get out?
[Wheeler] Who cares? Just get him back in the cage!
Get off me, Brag, or we'll crash!
-[chitters happily] -Yeah, 'cause our ten mil is getting away!
No way we're letting all that money escape!
[Richard] Dad, did you hear that crash?
Must have been the chopper that just flew over.
They're dispatching rescue workers, but it will take time to get up here.
We need to try and locate that crash and see if there are any survivors.
I'm sure the sound came from this direction.
You know these woods better than anyone, so, lead the way, Lukas.
I bet the pilot fired a rescue flare.
Or maybe poachers are hunting the Redwoods again!
Either way, let's keep a sharp eye and stick close.
Don't worry, Dad, I know what I'm doing.
No, I meant, I haven't seen any for so long,
I was afraid there might not be any deer left!
in another ten or so years,
I fear there won't be any wild animals left.
I'm going to invent a gigantic bionic insect-eating spider.
Hello! Spiders already eat insects, Richard.
We don't need Richard's useless bionics.
[gasps] I can't believe you just dissed our dad!
Dad's the most important bionics scientist in the whole world.
You know I didn't mean it like that!
I understand how you feel, Lukas.
That's why I got into bionics, to help people and injured animals.
[whispers] Hurry, this way. I want to help you.
[Brag] Hey! What the... [Wheeler] Where'd that rotten ape go now?
Okay, but I swear, one day, I'll find that filthy brat
The police said the helicopter they found was definitely used by poachers.
Lukas sent a holo-text saying he has a surprise for us.
[Lukas whispers] I just had to wait for the police to leave.
Shh! Be quiet, you'll scare the baby.
The poachers were shooting at him, so I had to help.
This is my dad, Dr. Leo Remy.
I swear, I'm never gonna let anyone hurt you again.
I'm certain that this is a baby gorilla,
which were believed to be extinct in the wild!
We have to turn it over to the police or a zoo or someplace...
No! Dad, we have to keep him!
If we don't, he could end up spending his entire life locked in a cage!
Now, I appreciate what you're saying, son, but while he's cute and little now,
once he becomes a full-grown gorilla...
[Richard] Apes in the wild could grow up to 5'11" and weigh over 500 pounds?
Anyway, if Mom were here, she'd never let you keep it.
Yeah, well, Mom moved back east with her new husband, so why don't you just--
You've always told us that it's every human's responsibility
to do everything they can to protect wildlife.
So, this is our chance to do the right thing!
We can see how he does back home in the city.
And you boys will be responsible for taking care of your...
I didn't ask to live with a smelly ape.
I'll do it! I'll take care of everything he needs.
[chuckling] All right, we'll give it a try.
Hey, hey, you need a name.
[Lukas] Hey, Dad, are you going to the lab today?
I wanna show Kong your island.
[Leo] Now, let's just see how baby Kong adapts first.
Oh, he'll be great! No prob. [softly] Oh, come on.
Until Anita sees his ugly face and freaks out.
But I made your favorite cookies, anyway.
Thank you, Anita, but I need to warn you that...
It's all right, Anita, it's not a monster.
It's, uh, just a baby gorilla.
Oh, yeah, Anita's gonna quit for sure if the ape isn't history.
Baby Kong totally loves your cookies.
At least el pequeño has good taste.
You can have the last cookie!
[Chatter] Bawk! No fair! Bawk! No fair!
Aw, man, I can't believe this.
[chuckling] Well, I'm very happy to see
Chatter's new bionic wing is working so well.
I am very glad you were able to save his life,
but did you have to save his voice as well, Dr. Remy?
-He's such an annoying chatter box! -[Chatter] Bawk!
Kong seems to have won Anita over.
Now let's see how the little fellow does inside our houseboat.
[Lukas] Hey, Kong, want to come toss the ball with us?
-[Kong chitters] -Do you know how to throw a ball?
Hey! I'm trying to study here!
[Lukas laughing] Come on, Kong! Over here!
Stop that! Awk! Big ape! Bawk!
[Leo] Kong is already as large and heavy as any gorilla in recorded history.
And he's still technically just a baby.
Dad, you should see his fastball.
Kong could pitch the World Series!
Check out what he did to my mitt!
-We need to get onto the dock! -[Lukas] Is it an earthquake?
-[crowd murmuring] -[man] What is that thing? It's huge!
I can't believe Kong wrecked our house.
[sighs] I'm just grateful no one was hurt.
Don't worry, everything will be okay.
Uh-oh! Big ape! Bawk! Big trouble!
I assure you, this animal is harmless.
Hold your fire, but keep your weapons trained on that...
Kong really blew it this time!
The police are gonna put him away, or maybe even destroy him for this!
It's okay, Kong, you know you can trust me.
You see, Captain, he's completely tame and quite gentle.
[stammers] Kong really is a good boy.
but I still can't let this giant home-wrecker run around free.
He must be contained and controlled
until a judge can decide what should be done with him.
I'm telling Dad, I'm taking you home.
They can't risk hitting your brother.
You are Dr. Leo Remy, the famous scientist?
Tell me, Doctor, is that creature
some super-sized bionic experiment of yours?
I can assure you that Kong is flesh and blood
and poses no threat to anyone.
I will stake my reputation on it and I take full responsibility for him.
And where are the boy and the monster-ape going?
Somewhere that Kong will be no danger to society.
Dr. Remy, what will we do now? Where will we all live?
Yeah, now that Kong totally trashed our houseboat.
I'd already been thinking about how we'd be able to keep Kong.
So, I bought a place for us in the Redwoods.
What? But that's not fair! I don't wanna leave the city!
Ugh, you're home-schooled, Richard, nothing changes there.
Look, son, I'm sure you'll feel differently when you see it.
[Lukas] Hey, watch it! [Richard] What's the big idea?
[Lukas laughs] The paint's supposed to go on the house, not on us!
I made lemonade for my hard-working muchachos!
Well, at least now we don't have to worry about his belching
I still don't think it's fair that Kong destroys our home,
and you move me to this bug-filled forest
just so we can keep him!
But, Richard, it wasn't just for Kong.
I've always wanted room for a state-of-the-art lab at home...
where you will be able to begin that robotic dinosaur you've always dreamed of.
[Lukas] I can't wait to see your first robotic dinosaur.
[Leo] But, Richard, you can only work on your project when I am present,
and even then, you must never touch any of the lasers.
Now, I need your word of honor that you will never go into the lab alone.
No, Kong! You are not allowed in here!
There's just too many delicate instruments,
Now, Lukas, I want your word, too,
that you will make certain Kong never goes into the lab,
You don't have to worry, Dad.
The last thing Kong and I want is to be indoors
when there's so much exploring to do outside!
Time to start building our top-secret fort.
No one, not even Dad, can know about it.
It's gonna be our own special hideout!
the California redwoods are the tallest trees on Earth.
[chuckling] Luckily, they're even taller than you.
That's what I call a real "king-size" bed.
And now I don't need to always take the Kong-vator to get up here.
It's so cool being up so high!
But I promise, one day, when I'm old enough to afford it,
we are gonna turn this place into a real fortress!
and I'll lay in enough banana chips
and other survival food to last a lifetime!
So no matter what happens, no one from down there, or anywhere,
will ever be able to hurt you.
I made it so it can crush anything that gets in our way!
[chuckling] Well, I'm proud of you, son.
Thanks, Dad, but it's still not right.
If I could just use your laser,
I know I could get it as smooth and shiny as my design.
You know my lasers are off-limits.
I don't see what's the big deal!
But maybe when I have time, I can do it for you.
I have to do it all myself.
Well, I think it looks amazing and you did a great job.
Dad, I can't find my computer tablet with my school assignments.
I'm sure I left it on my desk, but it's not there anymore.
I thought I saw Lukas take it outside yesterday
when he went to play with Kong after class.
But now I can't do my classes online and I have a big exam tomorrow.
It's not like you to lose something so important.
Well, you'll have to fly into the city with me today
I swear, I don't understand how it happened.
Richard, would you like to come with us?
Thanks, Dad, but I really shouldn't skip class today.
Not with the big exam coming up.
[Anita and Chatter singing] ♪ Vamos, vamos, vacuum! ♪
Perfect. Anita will never hear a thing.
Mind your own business, banana breath!
You're not even as smart as a three-year-old.
When this is done, Dad's gonna see how right I was.
Then he'll really be proud of me!
Stop bothering me, or when I'm done, I'll sic T-Rex on you.
No, Dr. Remy, I do not see Richard or Kong,
but I call 911 and they are sending a medivac--
Kong is carrying Richard out of your lab!
I'm sorry, I wish I could tell you.
Only Richard and Kong know what really happened in there.
Anita, did you talk to Dad?
Sí, the operation was a success.
Your brother will be all right.
I am afraid Richard told your father that it was all Kong's fault.
Your brother said he saw Kong go into the lab
and he was just trying to stop him.
even if there was something in the lab he wanted, which there isn't!
Richard has begged your father to get rid of Kong for causing the accident.
Come on, Anita, we both know Richard's lying.
I just can't let anything bad happen to Kong.
Your father said Richard will need to be away for some time.
But he should be as good as new...
Bionics? You mean Richard will be--
[Anita sniffles] I can't believe I have to say goodbye to one of my boys.
It's hard for all of us.
Son, I understand why your mother wants you living in Boston with her, but...
I wish you'd change your mind and stay with us.
Me, too. Come on, Richard, don't go. We can work it out.
This is the only place Kong's safe.
Dad, how can you stick up for that disgusting ape after what he did to me?
I'm tired of living in this dumb forest, in this ugly house,
having to share everything with my brother and his stinking ape!
With all the advancements we're making in bionics and prosthetics,
why, it won't be long before you're looking like your old self again.
Last report said that the storm may force rescuers to abandon the search.
I pray they can find the missing campers in time.
I'm so grateful you called Lukas to come help.
[Leo chuckles] Well, luckily, he wasn't too far away.
You know they were wrapping up a whale rescue in Alaska?
They had just delivered the injured beluga
to the marine sanctuary in Seattle when I called.
Ahhh! Yuck, yuck, yuck, yuck, yuck!
Good to see you again, Dr. Remy.
Thanks for getting here so quickly, Jonesy.
I know how important your rescue work is.
Well, we couldn't have saved half the animals without your bionics,
so let's call it even, sir.
Now, don't forget to give credit to Lukas' brother, Richard.
He's made incredible advancements in bionics and robotics
in my lab for the past three years.
None of us would be able to do what we do without Richard's--
Storm's building fast, we need to move.
If we don't find the missing campers soon, they'll freeze up there tonight.
they were last seen headed towards a place called Edgewood Ravine.
Yeah, Kong and I used to hike there.
Until we realized how unstable the entire area is.
Doesn't take much to trigger a landslide.
Bro, you need to stay here with Dad and Anita.
Lay low, make sure none of the searchers see you, okay?
Bad news. Storm's already grounded the rest of the rescue teams.
Looks like we're their only hope. Heat sensors picking up anything?
The cliffs are loaded with shallow caves that make the sensors useless.
I want to go home, please.
Honey, I told you, we can't move because of the landslide.
But I'm sure Mommy has rescue teams looking for us.
We just need to stay safe until they come.
Not sure how much more she can take.
The backup can't handle this kind of beating much longer.
I'm sorry, Lukas, but if we don't head back now,
they'll be searching for our wreckage at first light.
Daddy, what are we gonna do now?
No way, it looks like my little monkey doll...
Well, whatever it is, kids, it's clearly risking its life to get to us.
Or maybe it's super hungry and we look tasty.
He wants us to climb on!
I think we should trust him.
This amazing creature is our last...
It's gonna be okay now, Donny.
Everything checked out. Chopper's ready to go.
But it'd be a miracle if they survived
the freezing temperatures up there last night.
Looks like they had a great big beautiful ape keeping them warm!
What in the world is that thing?
That, my friends, is an amazing hero that just saved three lives!
[chuckling] Even though you didn't exactly lay low.
You gotta know this is gonna go viral,
so looks like the whole world's about to meet your big bro.
This magnificent creature risked his life to save my family.
Kong is a real live superhero.
[Richard] Oh, I can't believe what I'm hearing.
While there are many demanding that this incredibly powerful
and potentially dangerous wild beast be destroyed,
that pleas to spare its life are pouring in from around the world.
[Richard] Why can't they see that freak for what he really is?
I am the most highly advanced bionobot in the known universe.
Yes, I get that, I created you.
[reporter on TV] We are going live to Dr. Leo Remy's home
where authorities are attempting to capture the gigantic ape
Commissioner, please, Kong hasn't done anything!
[Anita blows raspberry] Of course he has.
Kong just saved two beautiful little children and their daddy.
And this is how you thank him?
I give you my word, Kong is completely harmless!
Dr. Remy, we've been down this road before.
Yes, when you were still a police captain.
Congratulations on your promotion, Commissioner Decker.
But I'll be back pounding a beat
if you can't get that beast of yours to surrender.
[man] Let me out of here! Help!
Dr. Remy, I need that thing to put my men down right now!
But I need your officers to back down.
[Decker] My men will be forced to open fire!
You put those nice policemen down this instant!
I mean it! Or no more cookies ever!
Do it for me, please, mi hijo! Por tu Anita!
I am going to bake you the biggest batch of banana chip cookies!
He not only obeyed, but he actually seemed to understand her.
But what would have happened if she wasn't here?
It could have ended very badly!
[laughing] Hey, he's like my two-year-old nephew.
Kong's mind is on par with a two- or three-year-old human child.
What's most important, as you can see,
he understands the difference between right and wrong.
So the question is, what to do with this giant?
There's still a lot of people demanding
that the governor do something about this threat.
Tell him I promise to find a way.
[Decker] Trouble is, we don't really have a facility
big enough or strong enough to hold him.
But what about the most famous, inescapable prison ever built?
[reporter] In the last few weeks, literally tens of thousands of people
have flocked to San Francisco from all around the world
in hopes of catching a glimpse of the giant ape
that, ironically, has been exiled to Alcatraz Island.
In appreciation for the outpouring of support,
Dr. Leo Remy has built a special tower
in the center of the island for Kong to climb...
...making it easier for the world to see this freak of nature.
It would appear Kong, King of the Apes, is a born entertainer.
Perhaps that's why rumors are flying
that Alcatraz Island may soon be transformed
[Lukas laughing] Good to see you, too, you big show-off!
Hey, Dad, everything okay? What's the big news?
I've been wondering the same thing.
I have the governor's blessing, plus all the funding needed,
to create the Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve
But, son, there is one major condition.
They insist Kong be fitted with a special control collar.
Kong wears a collar or they will...
Richard, I assured them that you could design the control collar for me.
It will be my pleasure to do this for you, Dad.
Lukas, we have the opportunity to create a real and lasting sanctuary
for the injured and endangered species you and Jonesy rescue.
A safe haven to protect against future extinctions.
Richard, with your exceptional talents in robotics,
you'll be able to bring natural history to life like never before.
You could create all of the life-size dinosaurs you always dreamed of.
Well, I'm certainly not going to be the one that stands in the way
I'll help you create... Kong Island.
The Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve.
Botila. I do not have friends.
Uh, trust me, Jonesy, you really don't want to fall for that one.
I'd never make a move on your brother's woman.
[automated voice on PA] Intruder alert! Intruder alert!
-Our security walls have been breached! -[Richard] Hmm.
See? Not everyone is a fan.
There have also been many threats against your ape.
Sounds like someone plans to make good on one.
We keep these on board to warn off poachers in the wild.
I programmed her with every known martial arts move.
I have a few belts of my own, maybe we can work out together sometime.
As long as Kong is around, we don't need weapons or Botila.
Who are you and what do you want?
Sorry to trespass, but you are a very hard man to reach, Dr. Remy.
I am Dr. Amy Quon and this is my brother, Danny.
Nice to meet you. Now get off our island.
Kong, dump them back in their boat or whatever they used to trespass.
He says, "Do it yourself." He doesn't work for you.
[scoffs] I suppose you came here to say this boy can talk to apes.
Kong's the first ape I ever met, but yeah, turns out I can.
[laughs] You know, you guys got a seriously funny gorilla here.
I've heard enough of this nonsense. Time to throw them out.
Actually, I want to hear more.
So, Danny, what else is Kong telling you?
That he really wants you to let me and my sis work here with him.
But I'm pretty sure he would have said it if he knew that's why we came.
[Lukas] How the heck did he know what Kong was saying?
Danny is a certified animal whisperer,
and I'm a licensed veterinarian, specializing in primates,
But, as you know, there are hardly any left in the world.
Just a few in zoos and none that we know of in the wild.
And certainly no creature on Earth like Kong.
I will do anything to be part of his team.
I'm gonna need hazard pay and a snot protector.
We will, of course, need to verify your credentials,
but I was already planning to bring on a vet
to care for the injured and endangered animals
Lukas and Jonesy will be bringing to the preserve.
If you check out, you're in.
And it looks like Kong's already hired himself a translator.
They won't be laughing when I'm finished with that hideous ape.
You can't do this to him.
But either Kong wears the control collar Richard made for him or he--
As long as your ape behaves himself, we'll never have to use this.
But, if he does get out of hand,
the pain I can inflict will bring Kong to his knees.
Dad, you know Kong doesn't deserve this.
Hey, buddy, I know how you feel.
Amy made me wear a tie once...
But you better leave that collar alone.
At least now the Remys can start turning this rock into Kong Island!
Aw, come on, man, give it up!
'Cause very soon you're gonna be a full-blown superstar!
Just don't forget, I knew you when...
Can you believe how fast this place is coming together?
You may loath Kong, but you must admit...
He's nothing but a dumb ape.
that dumb, pathetic ape just saved you 20 man-hours of highly-skilled labor.
[Leo] I am so proud of you, son.
[Leo] I remember when you were a boy, you said
your inventions would one day surpass mine.
[Anita] Hey, Dr. Remy, what are you doing here?
You should be in bed, eating the chicken soup I made for you.
just a little tired is all.
For so many months now, you are working much too hard.
Not me. I have an inexhaustible energy source.
Richard, we're ready for this big show you've been promising.
Botila, activate the mobile control panel.
This is what everyone will witness at tomorrow's grand opening
of the Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve.
[Danny sighs] Why can't that guy ever just call it what it is?
I was just remembering how fun it was being a kid with Kong.
He's still like a big kid.
Get ready, you are about to see what I am certain the media will call
the greatest attraction in theme park history.
This is the reaction I'll get tomorrow from the media and guests.
...are you absolutely certain it will be completely safe for the public?
Stop that, you dumb ape, before you damage it!
Make that expensive toy of yours back off before someone gets hurt!
Negative. Not possible. There is no override button.
That pterodactyl was programmed to lead the air show tomorrow.
There isn't nearly enough time to replace it.
That filthy ape destroyed everything again!
You still have many more pterodactyls,
plus, I'm sure everyone will be awed by all your other amazing creatures.
You know, Richard, if you don't want Kong to break your toys,
maybe you shouldn't use them to torment him.
Everyone who is anyone is here, the mayor, governor,
and frankly, too many movie stars and celebrities to count...
All here to congratulate Dr. Leo Remy
on his latest and unquestionably greatest achievement.
In addition to becoming a sanctuary
for many of the world's remaining endangered species,
a massive aquarium encircles the island,
created to protect all kinds of marine life.
The Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve,
already more commonly referred to as "Kong Island,"
is also home to many extinct species,
Of course they are all just harmless bionobots created by Dr. Richard Remy.
Like the terrifying megalodons and other prehistoric sea creatures.
And even a monstrous giant squid,
programmed to shock and delight visitors arriving on the monorail.
by all of the life-size dinosaurs and marine monsters.
But, clearly, everyone has come to see Kong.
The one and only living, breathing King of the Apes!
We call it, "The mega butt bow."
[laughing] Looks like a real crowd pleaser.
Your dad looks pretty pleased, too.
Well, Dr. Remy, you pulled it off.
Definitely a monumental day for the Remy family.
Yeah, so I wonder where Richard is.
[Lukas] I figured he'd be eating up all this press.
It seems very few people are interested in your artificial dinosaurs,
if they had been able to witness my spectacular pterodactyl air show.
humans are not simply fascinated by Kong, they are drawn to him.
Because most of them are just ignorant fools,
willing to pay to watch a freak of nature
with less intelligence than a three-year-old!
are weak, and deserve to become extinct.
The same as all the useless creatures he's always trying to save!
Bionics and robotics are the future.
I will not argue with that.
And one day I will prove it to him and the world...
Congratulations, Dr. Remy, on your phenomenal success.
[stammers] Now, most of the credit goes to my two sons,
who I know will keep my dream alive long after I am gone.
Nearly one year to the day
that the Remy Natural History and Marine Preserve opened,
its founder, Dr. Leo Remy, has passed.
[Richard] I'll make your dream come true.
[Richard] Find someplace else to put that thing.
Construction on my new dinosaur habitat starts today.
Lukas didn't say anything about moving the seal.
I'm the boss while my brother is away!
Don't tell me you're trying to take away this poor creature's habitat!
It's okay, Abe, the seal is staying right here.
We are supposed to be entertaining our visitors.
One useless seal is about as exciting as watching paint dry.
Animals aren't just for your entertainment, Richard.
And, anyway, don't worry, Jonesy and I plan to rescue a lot more.
but it can't compare to the prehistoric shark show I've designed.
Dad's dream was for us to save as many animals as we can from extinction.
I suppose one of them did that to you?
No, the poachers trying to exterminate her did,
which is why we need more sanctuary space, not less.
Which is what I came to talk about in the first place!
On the flight home, I decided to go over the books.
Turns out, you've already exceeded your bionobot budget by several million.
And don't even think about trying something like this again
when I'm away on a rescue mission.
And now, I've got to go see how the ligers we rescued are doing.
[Danny] I can't believe I'm going to get a chance to communicate
Wonder which language it's gonna speak, lion or tiger? [laughing]
Easy, everyone, we do not want to frighten the cats.
that since she's such a beautiful and majestic creature,
So, how come you guys had to rescue Lady?
Unfortunately, some people think it's cool to have an exotic pet.
Then, when they discover how dangerous they can be,
they release them into the wild,
without realizing most of these animals never learn to survive in nature.
Especially not with poachers hunting them.
Danny, see if you can talk to her.
She gets that you're just an overgrown softy.
And so is this lovable little fella.
They were very lucky you found them when you did.
Hey, that's a perfect name for you! Lucky!
[Danny] Uh, Kong wants to feed him.
You don't want to scare him.
and found no physical reason for his attitude shift.
He could just be missing Lukas and Danny.
It's the first time your brother's been away since you got here.
I know. Danny couldn't pass up the chance to see what's left of the Amazon.
Lukas has even begun teaching him to fly.
I've never seen the big guy act like this.
Maybe we should call them back.
Why not get Danny on the holo-screen?
See if he can "read" Kong, or whatever he does.
[Amy on monitor] So, we're hoping Danny can tell us what's wrong.
Afraid we can't come back yet.
They're clear-cutting one of the last sections of rainforest,
and we're hoping to get there before the poachers close in.
But I can try talking to Kong over the link.
See if I can get the big guy to tell me what's up.
Don't you want to say hi to Lukas and Danny?
You bent out of shape 'cause I took off with your bro?
[laughs] Promise I'll make it up to you
with the biggest super-sized banana smoothie on the planet!
I can't believe Kong would blow me off like that.
I think we'd better move Lady and her cub out of Kong's habitat.
Maybe we should come back right now.
[Jonesy] I'd hate to see you abandon the mission when you're so close.
We'll keep a sharp eye on Kong, but if he gets any worse,
Now that I know my do-gooder brother is far enough away,
it's time to really amp things up.
Increasing the frequency on Kong's control collar.
I just wanted to be certain that it would work.
We don't want Amy telling Lukas we need to close the park tomorrow
because his "star attraction" is actually a deadly savage.
I warned Lukas it wasn't over, but it will be very soon.
Well, I was monitoring Kong all night. He seemed totally normal.
It definitely looks like he's back to his old self.
Maybe it was just a bug.
Good thing, too, because the ticket office says the place is gonna be jammed.
Apparently, Richard ran some kind of one-day-only special promotion deal
that's packing them in even tighter than usual.
The island is now filled to capacity.
Can you hear me? Something has happened.
I know. Richard called a few minutes ago to say Kong's going berserk
and that everyone's in grave danger.
Last night, Danny and I both had the feeling we needed to get back.
I just hope it will be soon enough.
I can still increase his pain by two full decimals.
I wouldn't want to accidentally put the beast down...
I am unable to compute your logic.
My extraordinary bionobots need to save these people from the savage monster,
making me the hero of the hour.
I am programming them to destroy only their primary target...
Ladies and gentlemen, please try to remain calm.
No! No! That thing's gonna destroy him!
It is definitely occurring in real time.
Can't you see he's wiping out half my bionobots?
I will make Kong pay for this.
It appears you will need to catch him first.
he is planning to use the monorail to escape the island.
Don't just stand there, we have to finish him!
[Richard] What are you doing now, Botila?
I am covering my audio sensors
in preparation for your 99.9% probable tirade.
I had hoped to take that filthy ape down myself.

I want to be front and center
when the military finally shoots down the King of the Apes.

They will if Kong goes crazy enough.
What say we push the overgrown ape over the edge... literally?
No way will he be able to withstand maximum strength for long.
[pilot] Moving in closer for a clean shot.
[Danny grunts] You really sure I've had enough lessons?
When I give the word, veer clear,
then activate the auto-pilot right after I jump.
Thanks! You had me worried there for a sec.
That's good. Okay, now, you need to put down the plane...
No! Kong, I understand how you feel,
but I know you really don't want to hurt anyone.
Kong, you have to go to our secret place.
I'll meet you at our secret place.
You'll never be able to prove it.

Kong will be hunted down and destroyed.
Chico, I could put you over my knee...
Well, if you wouldn't crush it...
For the scare you gave me today.

I know it wasn't your fault.
It's that horrible collar Richard put on you.
Good news is, we're out of range of Richard's remote,
so he can't keep hurting Kong.
But we still need to figure out how to get it off of him.
If Kong will give me a lift.
It's really quite simple once you know how.
So, Lukas, where exactly is this secret place you told us about?
I was able to finance the last stage of my childhood dream.
either just from the air, or, as you just saw, from the ground, too.
I always figured you boys were building some kind of club house,
but this tree house es increíble.
Tree fortress is more like it.
-[shouts] How about giving me the tour? -[Kong grunts happily]
So, pal, this place have room for all of us?
[chuckles] Look, I really appreciate your help, all of you,
[scoffs] We are family. We stick together.
At least until we can find a way to vindicate Kong.
One hundred seventeen million ninety thousand, two--
But I have not completed calculating the total damage Kong has--
Either shut your mouth or I will shut you down.
Bottom line, it will cost a fortune to rebuild my facility.
But more importantly, I must replace my bionobots.
We need the force and firepower to finish off Kong.
I am having trouble computing why you are so calm.

for getting both the funds and the firepower.
With a little help from my brother.
[Richard on monitor] I strongly suggest you surrender Kong to the authorities.
No problem, Richard. Happy to do it, just as soon as you tell
Police Commissioner Decker and the media
that you used the control collar to drive Kong mad!
No one will believe the esteemed Dr. Richard Remy would do such a thing.
Well, if that's what you called to say, then goodbye.
Fine, if you don't care about your ligers anymore...
What? [stutters] What about Lady and Lucky?
Thanks to Kong's vicious rampage, their enclosure was destroyed,
so your precious ligers escaped the island.
You're the one who tracks animals for a living, so do your job.
Meanwhile, I've already spread the word
that I am offering a reward to anyone that finds them.
one day you will get what's coming to you.
-Well, what did tu hermano say? -[Kong hoots]
He said Lady and Lucky are missing.
I know, bro, but we'll find them.
Amy, the ligers are both GPS-chipped, right?
Yes. I have the receiver in my backpack.
I checked on the cats after Kong had already left the island,
they were safely locked in their temporary habitat.
Yeah, I figured Richard was lying.
You think he's using the ligers to try and bait us into a trap?
Yeah, but we still gotta save Lucky and his mom, right?
Don't worry, that's exactly what Jonesy and I plan to do.
No way, Kong, it's too dangerous. You need--
Save it, Lukas. Kong's made up his mind. He's coming, too.
[sighs] Kong is as valiente as he is stubborn.
-[Chatter] Stubborn supremo! Awk! -I have their signal!

[gasps] Lady's heart rate is off the charts!
She doesn't appear to be moving,
so she must be terrified of something or someone.
Okay, so how do you propose we sneak a gigantic gorilla
[laughing] This is the coolest ride ever!

He seems unusually nervous for some reason.
Duh, 'cause he never learned how to swim.

he was walking on the bottom, the water barely came up to his waist.

-We must find them before... -[faint alarm ringing]

you don't think that giant could be the baby we--

Pitch your fastball, Kong! Aim for the lights!

Good job, Kong! Now get us out of here, bro.

that the giant ape known as Kong is responsible

with the help of his radical master, Lukas Remy.

Yeah! Or even better, bat 'em back to sender!
